text: Replace Nested For Loops... or not
I have a script that loops through a series of four (or less) characters strings.
If have been able to implement it with nested for loops like so:

code:
chars = string.digits + string.uppercase + string.lowercase

for a in chars:
    print '%s' % a   
    for b in chars:
        print '%s%s' % (a, b)
        for c in chars:
            print '%s%s%s' % (a, b, c)
            for d in chars:
                print '%s%s%s%s' % (a, b, c, d)

text: Is this sort of loop nesting a bad thing, and if so, what would be a better way of accomplishing what I am doing?
